actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide that persons from whom lands are acquired by the Secretary of the Army for dam and reservoir purposes shall be given priority to lease such lands in any case where such lands are offered for lease for any purpose.

summary.text: Provides that persons from whom lands are acquired by the Secretary of the Army for dam and reservoir pruposes shall be given priority to lease such lands in any case where such lands are offered for lease for any purpose.

titles.title: A bill to provide that persons from whom lands are acquired by the Secretary of the Army for dam and reservoir purposes shall be given priority to lease such lands in any case where such lands are offered for lease for any purpose.
